description:
Forex Watchers mission is to make other people as passionate about forex trading as we are. Since then ForexWatchers has grown phenomenally and hereÂ´s your chance to join us. Your view to the markets will totally change.

Our Mission:

Our advanced methodology, accurate entry strategies, management techniques can only be earned by years of trading experience. Put all the ingredients together and you have a recipe that will change your game, take your trading to the next level and cut your learning curve to the minimum!

Further, our goal is to create successful traders and to provide them all the necessary trading tools and support they need to succeed in a fraction of the time!

The Forex Watchers - Trend and Consolidation Program is tailored towards individuals who like to trade the markets in a different and more successful way. Trading is a very different from Analyzing the markets. When it comes to trading there are psychological factors, journal keeping, discipline, and other factors that need to be mastered to successfully trade.

What will I learn in the online course:

  • Understand the Flow of a Trend
  • Backdoors
  • Consolidation and Ranges
  • Using Circles
  • Leg Counting
  • Measure the Strength of a Trend
  • How a Trend Refreshs
title: Forex Watchers: Trend and Consolidation
